abstract: If you find yourself racing around the Web to keep up with your pals on Facebook and Flickr, there is a Web browser built with you in mind.
snippet: If you find yourself racing around the Web to keep up with your pals on Facebook and Flickr, there is a Web browser built with you in mind.
lead_paragraph: If you find yourself racing around the Web to keep up with your pals on Flickr, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter and similar sites, there is a Web browser built with you in mind.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Keeping Up With You Pals Online
